level.text: In accordance with D.C. Code ยง2-2503 (1994 Repl. Vol.), the Executive Director shall be appointed and may be removed by a majority vote of the Board.
In accordance with D.C. Code ยง2-2503 (1994 Repl. Vol.), the Executive Director, subject to Board action, shall administer, supervise, and coordinate the operation of legal gambling activities.
In addition to the duties set forth in ยง 114.2, the Executive Director shall perform the following duties:
Post notices of all regular, special, and emergency meetings of the Board;
Inform the press, media and public of all regular, special, and emergency meetings of the Board;
Maintain and certify the minutes of the proceedings of the Board;
Maintain the transcripts of Board proceedings;
Establish and-implement a system for the distribution of documents;
Prepare all reports and financial, accounting, and revenue statements made or required by the Board;
Prepare the Board’s annual budget and supplemental request to be submitted to the Mayor;
Prepare annual financial statements required to be submitted by the Board;
Ensure that adequate internal controls are established in the areas of accounting and funds management;
Inform members of the Board of the fiscal activities of the Board and all matters of a financial nature; and
Procure goods and services for the Board.
